title: Is Khushwant Singh's famous novel Train to Pakistan available as an e-book? - Quora

response.answer_text: It’s available on Amazon Kindle. Just get the Kindle app and buy the eBook. It cost around ₹50 on the Kindle app. You can unlock the DRM if you want but I won’t post how to do it over here. After all doing so promotes piracy.
response.upvotes: Answer requested by Raminder Singh Gill
